name: temperature email alerts
ray@oneunified.net
info:
These need to be set prior to start node-red from the ocmmand line

$(EMAIL_USER)
$(EMAIL_PWD)

name: temperature
func:
msg.payload = { "command": "udevice", "idx": 38, "svalue": msg.payload.temperature_C.toString() };
return msg;

name: battery
func:
msg.payload = { "command": "udevice", "idx": 40, "svalue": (msg.payload.battery_mV/1000.0).toString() };
return msg;

name: lux
func:
msg.payload = { "command": "udevice", "idx": 37, "svalue": msg.payload.light_lux.toString() };
return msg;

name: uvi
supercap
func:
msg.payload = { "command": "udevice", "idx": 45, "svalue": msg.payload.supercap_V.toString() };
return msg;

name: snr
func:
msg.payload = { "command": "udevice", "idx": 47, "svalue": msg.payload.snr.toString() };
return msg;

name: rssi
func:
msg.payload = { "command": "udevice", "idx": 46, "svalue": msg.payload.rssi.toString() };
return msg;

name: rain
wind
humidity
noise
func:
msg.payload = { "command": "udevice", "idx": 48, "svalue": msg.payload.noise.toString() };
return msg;

name: tp2_temp_hum
tp2_bat
tp3_temp_hum
tp3_bat
tp1_temp
tp1_bat
tower_wind
tower_rain
